name: RARE ELEMENT RESOURCES INC.
description: Mineral resource company developing rare earth resources
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to mining, separation and production of rare earth elements in the U.S
Implementation and coverage of language covering rare earth mining and production in the 2019 National Defense Authorization Act
Efforts to expand existing procurement language for rare earth products to cover the entire supply chain from mining to magnets and other final products in the FY 2021 NDAA (H.R. 6395, S. 4049)
